Description:
Brand New Affordable Home
The quality & Style of this 4 Bedroom house will impress you . With a vibrant, charismatic personality & engineered designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living.
Comprising of a well appointed kitchen with Stone Bench Tops & stainless steel appliances overlooking the meals/family area, Master Bedroom with walk in robe and remaining bedrooms with BIR'S, double lock up garage with internal access plus much more. Outside surrounded by low maintenance gardens. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including Newbury Primary school, Aitken Creek Primary School, child care facility, and other local amenities be quick to inspect ! As this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Brand New Living with Family Credentials
With its instant street appeal this beautifully designed & spacious Porter Davis home will tick all the boxes on your must have wish list, that will accommodate all your families needs.
This free-flowing floor plan comprises of 4 bedrooms, ensuite with double vanities & walk-in robe to main, fully equipped kitchen with a large walk-in pantry overlooks a spacious open plan living with family & dining room, plus the added bonus of a rumpus room, double remote garage with internal access & landscaped front & rear yard.
Featuring full turn-key inclusions & premium upgrades, including, roller blinds throughout, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone bench tops, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED downlights to entry & living areas, alarm, letterbox, clothesline, fencing & much more.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops & suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child & Community Centre & beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by.

Transform Your Lifestyle !
High timber panel ceiling is what greats you. That's just the start! An impressive brick home. Situated within a close walk to Craigieburn train station, schools and shops. Comprises open floor plan with large kitchen that overlooks a bright spacious meals area. L' shaped lounge, formal dining area that's large enough to include a study, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double garage on a large block of land (648m2 approx.). An attached self-contained unit, teenagers retreat, home office or work from home; hairdresser for example (STCA).
This property has more than meets the eye. Call now & book your private inspection.

Description:
Classy and convenient!
Little Real Estate is taking guidance from the Australian Government and will continue to put in place the necessary measures to protect the community during all upcoming OFIs.
Elegant, sunlit and spacious with street-front style, this stunning 2 bedroom townhouse offers low-maintenance boutique luxury in the heart of Craigieburn.
Offering more than meets the eye over two lavish levels, discover roomy open-plan living/dining, and a stone-topped, stainless-steel kitchen with a breakfast bar.
Enjoy a handy ground-floor powder room, extra large carport, storage under stairs, and zoned living with both robed bedrooms and luxurious bathroom located upstairs.
Located on the corner of Windrock Avenue and Grand Boulevard
2 large carpeted bedrooms with built-in robes/walk-in robes
Deluxe bathroom with walk-in shower
Concealed laundry
Split-system heating and cooling units in living area and main bedroom
Recessed down-lighting
Remote-controlled carport at rear of property
Low maintenance garden and yard for entertaining
Take full advantage of easy access to transport, Craigieburn Central, lush parkland, restaurants, cafes, and so much more!
For more information, please contact Alex Melnychuk today.

Description:
Contemporary Class in A Plus Location
Enjoying a tranquil aspect, yet in the heart of Craigieburn, this impressively proportioned two bedroom townhouse is well-suited for owner occupiers and investors alike. A smart floorplan presents an upstairs light-filled kitchen with expansive open plan living and dining area with split-system heating and cooling. A sliding glass door leads from the living area to the balcony and timber pergola, with a northerly aspect, which boasts plentiful space for entertaining. The clever design will impress with a well-appointed kitchen featuring island bench with breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop, electric oven, rangehood, dishwasher, easy care tiled splashbacks, pantry and plenty of storage. Two good sized bedrooms, with built-in-robes, contemporary tiled bathroom with vanity and toilet, overlooking the internal courtyard. Extras include European laundry, undercover porch, front garden and single remote lockup garage with internal access. This spacious townhouse is situated only a short distance to the Highlands Shopping Centre, Mount Ridley College, Highgate Recreation Reserve and public transport.

Description:
One more SOLD by SKAD !! 5 buyers still looking !!
Loving your home is about more than just where you live or what your house looks like, it is about having confidence that you made the right choice for your home to reflect your personal style.
Well, look no further, this lovely home is thoughtfully designed for a lifestyle of sophisticated First Home Luxury, complemented with the finest interior features.
The inviting covered entry leads to an impressive foyer, drawing the eye to the bright, elegant living room and dining room.
The well-appointed kitchen features a large pure marble island used at times as a convenient breakfast bar for informal dining, with plenty of counters and cabinet space, complimented with a desirable second kitchen. The picture-perfect and deluxe living/family area offering stylish touches and comfort for your convenience.
The gorgeous master bedroom is both elegant and warmly inviting, enhanced by a large walk-in closet, en-suite with modern vanity, luxe shower with eye-catching floor to ceiling modern easy to maintain tiles.
Each of the two secondary bedrooms is equally warm and welcoming and designed for stylish comfort and convenience.
In years to come, you will be glad you purchased this lovely family home nestled in the peaceful pocket of the Craigieburn which is a place that makes you feel like you can escape, but at the same time find everything you need at your fingertips.
Call before it's SOLD !!
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
PRESENTATION + POSITION = PERFECT
With quiet residential surrounds and a stones throw away to Craigieburns major amenities, this generously proportioned renovated home offers convenient and care-free living, an ideal opportunity for first-time home buyers, downsizers and investors to capture a home that exudes the best in style and practicality.
The deceiving floor plan is a pleasant surprise with the huge open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area being the heart of the home. Equipped with a charming exposed brick wall this impressive and spacious zone is complimented by sliding stacker doors leading to an intimate courtyard with eco decking, the ideal outdoor entertaining haven. This home includes three bedrooms with built-in robes, separate laundry, central bathroom with tub, split system heating/cooling, new ducted heating system with 7 year warranty, solar panels, intercom and single car garage with drive through access to a carport.
Located minutes walk to medical centres, Craigieburn Plaza, and public transport, i.e. Craigieburn train station, and local bus service, reserves, and an impressive selection of schools. This quality property offers an enriching and convenient suburban lifestyle in an established and much-loved locale.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Proudly Presented With a Location to Match...
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Beyond its striking facade, the home's beautifully-appointed interior boasts a large master bedroom fitted with walk in robe and ensuite, three additional large bedrooms, main bathroom and the perfect family room.

An aspirational family lifestyle located in one of Craigieburn's Malcolm Creek Estate & premium streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, Stockland shopping centre, public transport and local schools.

Description:
BRAND NEW HOME WITH 3 LIVING AREAS!!!
A beautiful Brand New 4 Bedroom house in the heart of Craigieburn. Location doesn't get any better than this, with schools, Shopping Centre, parks and public transport just a short stroll away.
A fantastic opportunity to purchase this brand-new establishment designed to accommodate both a growing family and first home buyers. This magnificent home boasting four large bedrooms with the master comprising his and her WIR's and ensuite with double vanity, spacious living and separate dining area. Fabulous kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, plumbing point for refrigerator, 40mm stone bench tops, dishwasher & a walk-in-pantry.
Other features include :- Theatre room, Formal lounge, alfresco, fully tiled bathrooms, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high 2.7m ceilings, alarm system, video intercom, LED downlights, floating floorboards, double remote garage with internal and external access, exposed aggregate driveways, fully upgraded higher facade, concrete around the house, fully landscaped with full perimeter fencing.

Description:
BEAUTY IN THE MAKING
A fantastic opportunity to buy this magnificent off the plan 4 Bedroom house in the heart of Craigieburn. With estimated completion by June 2020, save $$$ on stamp duty or make numerous choices at no extra cost. Location doesn't get any better than this, with schools, Shopping Centre, parks and public transport just a short stroll away. Set on the prestigious Highlander Drive, this floorplan is skillfully designed to maximise utility.
With 4 generous sized bedrooms (master with full ensuite and WIR and remaining 3 bedrooms with BIR's), multiple lounges as well as a dedicated study room, this house will tick most of your boxes. When it comes to space it caters to all large and growing families with an open plan living area and a great sized kitchen with ample cupboard space and stainless-steel appliances.
An abundance of light, luxury and living space defines this exceptional family home situated in a privileged position, only minutes from Craigieburn Central and beautiful parklands.
This home is designed to accommodate both growing family and first home buyers.
Features:
2.7m ceilings
LED Downlights
Cooling
Ducted Heating
40mm stone bench top in kitchen
900 stainless steel appliances
Window furnishings
wrapped around fencing
Hot water system
Concrete driveway
& many more. Be early to give it your own touch of colours/ layout (STA)
Photos For Illustrative Purposes Only
More New Homes and House & Land Packages are available in Wollert, Craigieburn, Mickleham, Mernda and Kalkallo.
CALL NOW TO INSPECT!

Description:
Spacious & Elegant Family Living on 740 Sqm Approx.
A sophisticated free flowing design exists throughout this large single level family home offering a contemporary decor boasting both character and finesse. From the moment you step inside you will appreciate the flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. Comprising of ducted heating, evaporative cooling & split system cooling, rumpus/theatre room, oversized study with walk in robe or optional 4th bedroom, kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, wall oven, dishwasher, HUGE walk in pantry & meals area with adjoining family room, great size bedrooms all with built in robes & master bedroom with full ensuite containing a double shower and walk in robe.
Extra features include ducted vaccum, alarm system, in-built dryer closet, water temperature controller, triple remote control garage with internal access, large storage room & drive thru access, quality blinds throughout and timber bi fold doors leading you to the impressive split level timber decked OVERSIZED covered alfresco area with in built BBQ, sink & cafe blinds perfect for entertaining all year round. All set on a large allotment this home really is a must see. Ideally located in the ever so popular Fairways Village Estate among quality homes and parkland. Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long.
Insights: 36 Mission Hills Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
IMMACULATE RESIDENCE WITH 4 LIVING ZONES
This beautifully presented home offers a blend of space & style all in one amazing package that your family will enjoy for many years to come. Located in the prestigious Mt. Aitken estate, living here will make coming home an absolute pleasure. Cleverly zoned for large scale gatherings, the home comprises 4 large bedrooms (2 with walk in robes & 2 with built in robes), very spacious ensuite & walk in robe to main, large upstairs retreat, formal lounge room, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & walk in pantry, oversized main bathroom, a spacious meals area and family room as well as separate theatre room or optional 5th bedroom. Outside you will find a large decked alfresco overlooking a generous yard with manicured gardens ideal for the kids. All this and conveniently located close to bus stops, local schools & shops, parkland and so much more.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy!
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Beyond its striking facade, the home's beautifully-appointed interior boasts a large master bedroom fitted with walk in robe and ensuite, three additional large bedrooms, stunning main bathroom and the perfect family room.
Other luxuries include kitchen with stainless 900mm steel appliances plus dishwasher, oversized dining room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality light fittings, double car garage with internal access, immaculately landscaped front and rear gardens plus alfresco area.
An aspirational family lifestyle located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & premium streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, Stockland shopping centre, public transport and local schools. This home really is the complete package, be quick to inspect as it won't hang around for long!
Insights: 13 Macaulay Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Calling All First Home Buyers & Investors!!
If you're looking for that first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go. Situated right in the heart of Craigieburn, this home comprises of 2 large bedrooms upstairs, as well as a main bathroom and study nook. Downstairs you will find a roomy living and meals area and a well-appointed kitchen offering stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and dishwasher. Step outside and you will find a fantastic, low maintenance backyard, complete with decking and an alfresco with built in bench seating creating the perfecting environment for entertaining all year round. Other features include split system heating/cooling, rear access car accommodation for 2 cars, and much much more. This property will not disappoint, Inspection is a must!!
Insights: 25 Huntingfield Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Family Perfection with Every Indulgence
Intelligently designed, beautifully appointed & bathed in natural light, this as-new residence 4 bedroom delivers a family lifestyle beyond compare along with quick & easy access to the best of Highlands.
High square-set ceilings throughout, the home's vogue interior comprises an extra-large master bedroom with fitted walk-in robe & luxurious ensuite with double vanity & double shower, together with 3 additional bedrooms (built-in robes) & stylish main bathroom.
Complementing the vast & versatile open-plan living/dining area is a gourmet kitchen with
stone benchtops & splashbacks, dishwasher, 900mm cooking appliances & adjoining butler's pantry.
Other first-class features include zoned ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, alarm & video intercom, large laundry with ample cupboard space, on-trend black fittings, soft-close cabinetry & double blinds throughout. Stacker doors reveal an al-fresco entertaining area & neat gardens all-round, plus the added advantage of a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Close proximity to Craigieburn's growing array of primary & secondary schools, popular parks & shopping centres along with easy access to Mickleham Road & the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 102 Highlander Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
